mapper.update:
update trainee
training_id = #{trainingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workunit = #{workunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update trainee set training_id = #{trainingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workunit = #{workunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
